title: What is the interpretation of cucumbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Cucumbers in dreams. Interpreters say that the dream symbolizes goodness and carries many positive connotations, but in some cases it portends evil. Cucumbers in dreams. The interpretation of a dream about cucumbers indicates goodness, blessings, and abundance of nutrition. Unleash torment and victory over the enemies. Seeing a big choice is an indication that the dreamer will soon get rid of the negative thoughts that have controlled him and think in a positive way and enjoy happiness and peace of mind. If the dreamer plans to start a new project in professional life and dreamed of a small choice, this indicates that this project He will succeed and achieve a lot of profits. Cucumbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that cucumbers in a dream translate into an abundance of goodness, because it indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s material condition and an increase in his money. His health. If the dreamer eats a cucumber, the dream shows that he has great responsibilities that exceed his capacity, so he feels psychological pressure and tension. If the dreamer is married and his wife is pregnant and sees a cucumber in his dream, then he has good news of the birth of girls. The interpretation of a dream about cucumbers for a single woman indicates an improvement in her health and psychological condition and the emergence of many positive things in her life in the coming period. And if the visionary is living a love story at the present time She dreams that she is eating yellow cucumbers, as this indicates her separation from her partner in the near future. A wilted cucumber in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes the presence of some obstacles that prevent her from achieving her goals, but she has a strong will and is trying to overcome these obstacles. If the dreamer is a student Sciences and dreams that she is cutting cucumbers, then she has the good news that she has achieved amazing success in her studies. A dreamer in the coming period, and must be patient and strong. Eating cucumbers in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about cucumbers indicates for a married woman To relief from distress, an increase in her financial income, and seeing cucumbers indicates that the dreamer feels stable and happy in his married life. It is said that green cucumbers mean long life, continued health, and feelings of sadness, anxiety, and deterioration of her psychological state. If a married woman is unemployed and dreams that she is planting cucumbers, she has good news. Sarah believes that she will find a wonderful job opportunity in the near future, and buying cucumbers in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of the hesitation he is experiencing and make the right decision in the coming period, but buying withered cucumbers in a dream indicates that the dreamer is mistreating her husband and making many mistakes. title: Interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in a dream, it is one of the very disturbing dreams. Exposure to influence, except that the site and its managers have nothing to do with interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of carrying the Qur’an in a dream If one sees that he is carrying the Qur’an, this may indicate the blessing and nourishment he obtains in this period. Seeing someone carrying the Qur’an may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life During those days. Seeing yourself holding the Qur’an in a dream may indicate the tremendous livelihood that the dreamer will gain during this period. If one sees himself holding the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of catching the head of a snake in a dream Catching the head of a snake in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s ability to achieve success and ambitions. Dreaming of catching the head of a snake in a dream may indicate a material loss that the dreamer will overcome with God’s grace. If someone sees that he caught the head of a snake, this may indicate Victory over an enemy who was close to him. If a person sees the head of a snake and catches it, this may indicate rejection of the great abuse that surrounded the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a policeman in a dream: Seeing a person being arrested by a policeman may indicate some Disagreements and family problems that he faces during this time. In the event that he is arrested by a policeman, this may indicate some financial crises that the dreamer suffers during those days. In the event that a person believes that he has been arrested by a policeman, it may indicate This indicates some of the obstacles that the dreamer faces in his scientific and professional life. It is possible to see a policeman arresting a person in a dream, which indicates some of the fear that the dreamer felt during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of someone grabbing me from my back in a dream. Anyone can see in Dreaming that someone grabbed me from behind indicates his diligence and struggle in life. A dream of grabbing someone from behind in a dream may indicate the peace and calm that the dreamer felt at that time. In the event that someone sees that someone has grabbed him from his back This may indicate his desire to get rid of problems and fears from his life at that time. Seeing the person who grabbed him from behind could mean that he is free from life’s problems and the beginning of a new page, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about arresting a thief in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he has arrested A thief, may indicate some problems that the dreamer faces in his life in those days. Dreaming of catching a thief in a dream may indicate the arrival of the dreamer’s desires and goals. Anyone who dreams of catching a thief may indicate a material loss that the dreamer will overcome and must seek God’s help. In If a person sees that he has arrested a thief, this may indicate that he has recovered from the disease and been freed from pain at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about arresting Satan in a dream: It is possible that seeing Satan captured indicates misfortune that the dreamer may encounter during this time.

title: Interpretation of seeing a church in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a church in a dream: It is known that the church is the place designated for practicing Christian beliefs and spirituality, and Christians go there to worship and practice some religious rituals. In a dream, it includes men, women, married women, widows, and divorced women. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a church: 1- According to Ibn Sirin, the church is a house of adultery or death, a cemetery, or a place for selling or drinking alcohol. The church also refers to houses of immorality, blasphemy, dancing, obscenity, and chanting, and in some cases The church can indicate misfortunes, mourning, or trials and mourning houses.2- Many interpreters agreed with Ibn Sirin that seeing a church in a dream indicates that a previous act is legally imprisoned or forbidden, or that it portends the shooting of the sinner or the perpetrator of sins.3 - Whoever sees in a dream that he is praying, or remembering God, or crying humbly inside a church, this means that he will visit or enter a cemetery or see the funeral of a dead person. 4- Whoever sees in a dream that he is crying with screams and lamentations in the church as a sinner, or sees that he is carrying something that shows distress or sadness, it means that he will be in prison. 5- If one sees a dead person or a funeral inside a church, this indicates that the person has deviated from religion by his actions, and that he will enter Hell if he does not repent, and it is also a severe warning to the man. The dreamer. Until he returns to the teachings of his religion. 6- Whoever sees in a dream that he is reading the Qur’an or calling for prayer in the church, this indicates that he will triumph over his enemies and those with him. By God’s orders. 7- As for whoever sees himself praying in the church with people and following them and loving them, this indicates that he will follow disbelief, adultery, heresy, drink alcohol, or commit what God has forbidden from sin. 8- If he sees that he is praying with the people in the church in front of the cross This indicates that he will work on the drums, because the cross is often made of wood in the church. 9- If a woman sees in her dream that she is inside the church, this means that she will attend a wedding in which nudity and the blowing of trumpets and drums are prohibited, or that she will go to a person’s funeral. Close to her. Sadness and darkness prevail. 10- Whoever sees that his house has turned into a church or a place for Christians, this indicates that he will do words and deeds for a fate contrary to what the Christians say. Interpretation of the vision of the church for Al-Nabulsi 1- The church, in Al-Nabulsi’s opinion, indicates asceticism, fear of God, and crying because of His fear and knowledge. 2- To indicate sadness, grief, anxiety, grief, falsehood, slander, slander, slander against a chaste woman, and dancing and having fun on musical instruments. 3- Or declaring an unjust ruler. 4- If a single person sees that he is inside a church, this indicates marriage.5 - If he is married and sees that he is praying inside the church with a belt around his waist, this indicates that he will have children. 6- The unity of the church and its height indicates the weakness of religion and error. Interpretation of seeing the church in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen says: Seeing the church may be evidence of the presence of an adulteress in the The life of the dreamer, or it may be an expression of the dreamer’s work in a place that sells, trades, and drinks alcohol. It may be the view of the dreamer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Whoever sees that he is drinking alcohol in a dream, he is worried because alcohol is one of the drinks that God Almighty has forbidden; Because it lacks reason and is satisfied. That is why anyone who sees this vision begins to look for different indicators and interpretations of it. That is why we will tell you the opinions of dream interpreters about the interpretation of seeing wine in a dream in detail for both men and women. Interpretation of the dream of seeing wearing necklaces and aprons in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wine in a dream for a single girl. Ibn Sirin says that the appearance of wine in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that there is a lot of anxiety And sadness in that girl’s life now. Drinking wine with her lover in a dream may also indicate that this girl is committing immorality and forbidden matters with her lover and must stop doing that. But if the girl sees wine in front of her in a dream and does not drink from it in the dream, this indicates that this The girl does not make mistakes and does not commit taboos. If a girl sees in a dream a friend who is known for drinking alcohol, this may be a warning sign for that girl to stay away from these friends because they are bad friends. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a pigeon being slaughtered in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing alcohol in a dream for a married woman, says Ibn Sirin You will see that if alcohol appears in a married woman’s dream, this may indicate many marital problems in that woman’s life. If a married woman sees that she is drinking alcohol with her husband, this indicates that this man is carrying out forbidden things in his home, and this woman is helping him in that. Many glasses of wine in a married woman’s dream may indicate many quarrels in this woman’s life and between her and her relatives and friends. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a single girl marrying a married man in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wine in a dream for a divorced woman. Imam Al-Sadiq says that the woman who drinks wine and enjoys its taste In a dream, she commits forbidden things at this time and has to return to God Almighty. If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband was drinking alcohol in a dream, this indicates that he will cause a lot of trouble to this lady in the coming period. Drinking alcohol in a woman’s dream could be A divorced woman is a sign of losing a loved one in the coming period. Al-Nabulsi also confirms that alcohol in a dream generally indicates negative changes that will occur in the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pineapple in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing wine in a dream for a man: drinking alcohol in the workplace indicates However, this man committed some mistakes in the field of work that are prohibited by law. As for consuming alcohol at home, it appears that this man earns forbidden money and spends it on his family. Drinking alcohol with those whom this man knew indicates that this man will join them in committing a forbidden act. As for seeing wine and not approaching it and drinking it in the dream, it is evidence that this person is righteous and does not commit immoral acts and sins. Ibn Sirin says: Drinking wine for a single man is one of the signs that the man is approaching marriage. As for drinking wine without the dreamer being exposed to intoxication, it indicates He is faithful to

title: Peanuts in a dream: Interpretation of dreams about peanuts for a married, pregnant and single woman

preview.html: Dear gentlemen and ladies, who are loyal to the dream interpretation site and its new users, welcome to this meeting. We will begin to present the interpretation of peanuts in a dream according to what was mentioned in the most famous Arab and Islamic works and others. Where we learn in particular about the meaning of peanuts in visions, whether it is for a married man or woman, pregnant or single. But before that, let us get to know this fruit or plant before we discover its meanings in the dream. The pistachio is a plant that belongs to the (Petmia) family and is spread mainly in the Levant (Syria, Lebanon, and Palestine). Its fruit has a delicious taste. It is eaten dry and extracted from the oil. Its pulp tends to... To turn green, and in some countries it is made into jam or paste. This plant or its fruit is distinguished by its unique color, which tends towards green, and usually gives this color a special aesthetic touch, whether in a dress, robe, or decoration. The properties that peanuts enjoy in... Waking life has strong and distinct connotations in a dream, such as its distinctive color, unique taste, rarity, or high price in some countries. Peanuts in a dream: Interpretation by Ibn Sirinj It is stated in the book Interpretation of Dreams by Sheikh Muhammad Ibn Sirin: Peanuts in a dream mean easy money (easy access To him), as for peanuts, it is a sign of human generosity. Peanuts in a dream: Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. The interpretation of pistachios was also mentioned in Al-Nabulsi’s famous book (The Smell of Creatures in the Interpretation of Dreams) and he described it as follows, saying: The pistachio in the interpretation indicates a noble person. The interpretation is praiseworthy because it expresses the goodness that comes from the sea or travel, and salted peanuts may indicate the pregnant woman’s imminent due date. Note: The interpretations of Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin are included in this article with the permission of the editor, so that the interpretation is compatible with the peculiarities of the era. While maintaining the general and basic meaning. The meaning of peanuts in one dream: Any dried fruit or fruit in the interpretation is considered good, especially if it has a sweet or delicious taste, and salty dry fruits such as almonds, peanuts, or pistachios are in the interpretation of money, profit, or news. A task or a happy event. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating or eating peanuts, this is a good interpretation. Perhaps the dream indicates a benefit that the girl will receive after a long time. Peeled peanuts are money that is spent or well spent, and peanut shells can indicate a surplus or surplus of money that requires saving or investment. It is not a good interpretation to eat green, undried pistachios, because it may express worries and problems that are not before the foresight. Peanuts in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate that a generous man is proposing to her, if the girl is, of course, of marriageable age. The meaning of peanuts in a dream for a married woman: It is in a praiseworthy dream. If a married woman sees that she is buying peanuts, this is money coming her way. For her, and if she sees that her husband is giving her peanuts,

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing weight in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about losing weight for unmarried women: When a girl dreams that she has lost a lot of weight and become very thin, this is a sign that she will fail in exams. It may indicate that she is afraid to choose a life partner and cancel the engagement. It also means that she has resigned from her job. As for the fat girl, in reality she saw herself losing some of her weight in The dream and she was happy with it, which indicates achieving goals and success. As for the skinny girl who dreams that she gains weight in the dream and makes her happy, this indicates that she will obtain a lot of goodness. Gaining weight in the dream indicates many worries and problems. A girl’s dream of gaining a lot of weight indicates That she will enter into some project, but it will be difficult for her. As for the dream, weight is a sign of marriage. The meaning of the dream of losing weight in a dream for a married woman. A fat married woman who dreams of gaining weight is a sign of goodness. Host. When she dreams that she has lost a lot of weight and become very thin and feels sad, this indicates that she is suffering. It is the result of her husband’s problems or a financial crisis. Perhaps the vision indicates the failure of the dreamer to manage her life’s affairs. It is possible that weight gain in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the goodness and blessing that she finds for herself. A noticeable increase in weight shows a lack of confidence in the dreamer himself or a sign of illness. Meaning A dream about losing weight in a dream for a pregnant woman A dream about losing weight in a dream is not recommended for a pregnant woman because it is necessary for her to gain weight and not the other way around. Whoever dreams of losing weight in a dream appears not in good health. Or he is approaching the date of birth, which is difficult for them. As for whoever sees that there is a noticeable increase in Her weight in a dream is a sign of good health for her and the fetus. Interpretation of losing weight in a dream for a man. A man who follows a diet to lose weight in a dream is a sign of change in his life for the better. Anyone who sees himself measuring his weight in a dream is a sign of many good things. A man who dreams indicates He is standing on a scale in a dream, avoiding problems. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing sunglasses

preview.html: Sunglasses protect the eyes from harmful sun rays and help to see better in bright sunlight, as seeing wearing sunglasses in a dream is a recurring vision for some, so the interpreters who dream of us explained some interpretations of this vision, which we will do. Explain to you. Interpretation of seeing a dream about dough in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sunglasses in a dream for a single woman. A girl wearing elegant sunglasses indicates that this girl will get a special job opportunity in the near future. The sunglasses worn by the dreamer indicate that this girl has a great ambition that she is always trying to achieve. If the sunglasses are black and hide the girl's features in the dream, this may indicate that there is a dangerous secret in this girl's life that she is trying to hide from others. Colored sunglasses in the dream of an unmarried girl predict that she will enter into a romantic love story that ends in a happy marriage. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dirt in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of sunglasses. Al-Nabulsi says that whoever receives glasses as a gift from a person known to him, this indicates that he has received benefit or help from that person. If an unmarried girl sees that she is receiving sunglasses as a gift from a man she knows, this indicates that this man has a desire to marry that girl. When a married woman receives sunglasses as a gift from her husband, this indicates that this husband gives his wife the sense of security and stability that this lady needs. Giving sunglasses to her ex-husband who is separated from her suggests her return to That man again. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a scarf in a dream. Losing glasses in a dream Dream interpreters say that losing sunglasses in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has missed a good opportunity in his life because he did not think carefully before making a decision. When a married woman dreams of losing her glasses, this means that she will be exposed to divorce and separation from her husband. Losing the glasses of the engaged woman indicates that her engagement is not complete and that she is exposed to its dissolution. As for the pregnant woman who sees the loss of her glasses in her dream, she may lose the fetus and miscarry and she must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about the abdomen in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about wearing glasses for a married woman If a married woman sees herself in a dream wearing elegant sunglasses, this means that she has a special place in her husband's heart. Seeing more than one pair of sunglasses in a married woman's dream indicates prosperity in her financial situation and stability in her married life. Wearing black sunglasses in a married woman's dream may indicate control over some of the pressures and problems in that woman's psyche at that time. If the glasses that the married woman wears are glasses and she does not wear glasses, this indicates that some mysterious things will be revealed to her in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a bird Seagull in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a man wearing sunglasses in a dream. A group of dream interpreters believe that a man wearing sunglasses in a dream can mean that he will

title: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a pigeon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a dove in a dream by Ibn Sirin. During sleep, a person sees many dreams that differ from one person to another. An example of these dreams is seeing a slaughtered dove. It is one of the visions that interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin interpreted and reported on its connotations and suggestions that depend on the psychological and social state of the pioneer. Since pigeons belong to the bird family, what is the interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a pigeon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A dream about a slaughtered pigeon in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Pigeons are considered one of the beautiful birds found all over the world, which pleases the eye of the beholder, and it also has a beautiful voice. A person may see slaughtered pigeons during this and become anxious. Ibn Sirin narrated the dream interpretation of slaughtered pigeons in a dream, which came as follows: Seeing a slaughtered pigeon in a dream for a man who has never been married before means that he will marry a girl of religious character. Ibn Sirin also says that slaughtering black pigeons is an unpleasant vision because it indicates... An imminent sin. When you see that a dove is approaching the dreamer, this dream brings with it a lot of goodness, and indicates good news in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of a slaughtered and clean dove for a married woman: Doves appear in beautiful bright colors and a married woman may see a slaughtered dove in her dream, This is her obsession, and here is the interpretation of a dream about a slaughtered and cleaned pigeon for a married woman: A dream about a slaughtered and clean pigeon indicates the family and financial stability of this married woman with her husband. When a married woman sees that she wants to slaughter a pigeon and then cook it for her husband and children, this symbolizes the woman’s determination to live a life A happy and happy marriage with her husband and her family. When the wife sees in a dream that she was slaughtered in a dream, and she was suffering at that time from family turmoil, this indicates the end of marital disputes, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream: The connotations of a raw dove may not be reassuring to the beholder and cause him trouble. In his coming days, especially when a married woman sees her. Here is the interpretation of seeing a raw dove in a dream: When a person sees that he wants to catch a dove but turns away from it, this indicates the approach of defeat and failure. This indicates that he is committing heinous and ugly acts carried out by the fortuneteller to achieve his interests, while seeing a girl marrying a raw dove indicates her good choice and it will God honors her with an urgent pregnancy immediately after the wedding. Interpretation of a dream about a slaughtered and cleansed dove for a pregnant woman: Scientists unanimously agreed that seeing a dove in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that includes good news for her in the coming days. Here is the interpretation of a dream about a slaughtered and cleaned dove for a pregnant woman: Seeing a slaughtered dove for a pregnant woman indicates Childbirth is approaching and she must prepare for it. A pregnant woman’s slaughtered and cleaned dove indicates the arrival of a baby girl. Dreaming about a slaughtered dove indicates that the pregnant woman’s affairs will ease and that God will facilitate the birth process. Eating doves in a dream for a pregnant woman also symbolizes the acquisition of abundant money, abundance, and earning a livelihood. Which counts

title: The most prominent interpretations of Ibn Sirin for seeing pomegranates in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream: Is pomegranate in a dream a positive symbol? What is the interpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream for single, married, pregnant and divorced women? Learn about the clues and interpretations provided by leading scholars about the pomegranate symbol in the article below. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. Search on Google for an online dream interpretation site. Dream of pomegranate. Interpretation of dreaming of many pomegranates in a dream indicates luck and a lot of money. The jurists said that pomegranates are Symbols that explain the intelligence of the fortuneteller, as he is characterized by creative thinking. A lot of pomegranate seeds in a man’s dream is evidence of his lineage, as he has many children in his life. The dreamer who eats a pomegranate in a dream and enjoys its taste is one of the believers who are united by God in reality. Fresh pomegranate In a dream, it is evidence of good deeds and helping others. If a poor man eats a delicious pomegranate in a dream, then he will attain wealth and status, and it is not good for him to see a poor person eating a rotten pomegranate because it indicates the seriousness of distress. If a rich man eats a pomegranate in a dream, he will attain A great blessing from God, which is the blessing of money and health. Seeing eating pomegranates in a sick person’s dream indicates healing of the body and the return of health and energy to the dreamer. Pomegranates in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: If the taste of pomegranates in a dream is delicious and sweet, this is evidence of good, halal money. As for seeing a rotten pomegranate in a dream, it represents corruption in the dreamer’s morals and religion and may indicate forbidden money. A rotten pomegranate in a dream may indicate corruption in the morals of the dreamer’s children, and he should not neglect them and correct their behavior before it is too late. When a sultan sees a pomegranate in a dream, he adds a pomegranate to his strength. New, big and full of goodness. If the dreamer opens a pomegranate in a dream and sees its seeds scattered on the ground, this is a sign of disappointment and loss or waste of money. Pomegranates in a dream, interpretation of Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq interprets seeing pomegranates in a dream as a harbinger of the coming of goodness and abundant living. Imam Al-Sadiq says Whoever sees himself picking pomegranates in his dream is a creative person in his work and will soon get a promotion. Eating pomegranates in a single person’s dream indicates a close marriage with a beautiful girl and living happily with her here. Seeing a married man giving his wife a pomegranate in a dream indicates that he has heard good news. His heart, such as her upcoming pregnancy and the feeding of her righteous offspring, or the arrival of abundant wealth containing blessings. Imam Al-Sadiq stated in his interpretation of seeing food in a man’s dream that this indicates that its owner will soon become famous and gain people’s love and respect. A dream about a pomegranate for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about a pomegranate for a single woman shows her faith in God And her love for religious principles and teachings. If an unmarried woman desires to engage in work while awake and sees many pomegranate seeds in a dream, this indicates a fruitful career and a respectable job in which she will soon be involved. If an unmarried woman eats pomegranate seeds with a strange young man in a dream, she will enter Soon her husband's home and God will provide for her

title: Interpretation of seeing breakfast during the day in Ramadan in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing breakfast during the day in Ramadan in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In one dream we have many dreams and each of these dreams has its interpretation and meaning. The month of Ramadan is considered one of the most important acts of worship imposed by the Islamic religion on all Muslims, provided that they are healthy adults. Breaking the fast during the day in Ramadan in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of dreams and visionsWhen we talk about the interpretation of dreams and visions, we must know that dreams are among the most important natural phenomena that accompany every... People in this life, in addition to the fact that dreams are known to be illusions. And the illusions that he sees during his period of rest, which is the period of sleep, such as visions, and the imaginary things that come to a person’s mind when he is in a period of neglect and indifference to the subject he is looking at, and the interpretation. Dreams are known to be one of the important sciences studied by many scholars and religious scholars, and it is based on studying the meanings of dreams. See also: Interpretation of a dream of my wife with another man in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing breakfast by Ibn Shaheen during the day in Ramadan. There are many different interpretations that have been widely spread. Among the religious scholars in the Islamic world, the most important of which is the interpreter of visions Ibn Shaheen, as Ibn Shaheen is famous for his interpretations that follow the rules and matters of religion and what is correct. Supporting these interpretations, some social networking sites talked about interpreting the vision of breaking the fast in Ramadan, but in a wrong way and with accuracy that is not required. Whoever sees breaking the fast in a vision and it was the morning of the month of Ramadan, it means that he will experience the path of goodness and stay away from the path of misguidance. Whoever saw the breaking of the fast in a vision and it was the morning of the month of Ramadan, but ungrateful, this means that he will recklessly ignore religion. Whoever sees breaking the fast in a vision, and the time is the time for the Maghrib call to prayer, then this is good news that he will travel or perform Umrah in this blessed month. Whoever sees breaking the fast in a vision and it is the morning of Ramadan, but he does not fast, this means that the vision warns him of some The dangerous things that will happen to him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, especially Interpretation of a vision of breakfast by Ibn Sirin during the day in Ramadan? When we talk about the interpretation of dreams and visions, we must take into account that the interpretation of visions is one of the most important interpretations that website visitors search for. Social media recently, in addition to the fact that many celebrities’ pages have spoken about the interpretation of the morning vision during the day in Ramadan, which is mysteriously attributed to the interpreter of visions Ibn Sirin, so we presented to you our distinguished and wonderful article to talk about the interpretation of the morning vision during the day in Ramadan by the translator Ibn Sirin. Sirin, which is as follows: If a Muslim sees in a dream that he is breaking his fast with the permission of sunset, this is a great good and a great reward that the Muslim will attain if he does good deeds in this blessed month. When a Muslim sees a dream that he is breaking his fast during the day of Ramadan, this portends a great calamity and difficulties that he may face in the future. When A Muslim sees in a vision that he is breaking his fast when he has fasted the entire month of Ramadan, so this is evidence of overwhelming happiness. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a big house and many rooms by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi Here, dear brothers and sisters
